remixlab.bias

Interface Grabber

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScene, GenericFrame, GrabberObject, InteractiveFrame, InteractiveGrabberObject, Scene

    public interface Grabber
    Grabbers are means to attach a user-space object to all the Agents (see Agent.addGrabber(Grabber)) through which it's going to be handled. For details, refer to the Agent documentation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfGrabsInput(BogusEvent event)
      Defines the rules to set the grabber as an agent input-grabber.
      void performInteraction(BogusEvent event)
      Defines how the grabber should react according to the given bogus-event.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfGrabsInput

        boolean checkIfGrabsInput(BogusEvent event)
        Defines the rules to set the grabber as an agent input-grabber.
        See Also:
        Agent.updateTrackedGrabber(BogusEvent), Agent.inputGrabber()

      • performInteraction

        void performInteraction(BogusEvent event)
        Defines how the grabber should react according to the given bogus-event.
        See Also:
        Agent.handle(BogusEvent)
